validationLetter: At least one letter in the password
validationDigit: At least one digit in the password
projectDescription: GraphQL is a query language designed to build client applications by providing an intuitive and flexible syntax and system for describing their data requirements and interactions.
aboutSchoolText1: is free-of-charge and community-based education program conducted by The Rolling Scopes developer community since 2013.
aboutSchoolText2: Everyone can study at RS School, regardless of age, professional employment, or place of residence.
aboutSchoolText3: The mentors and trainers of this school are front-end and javascript developers from different companies and countries.
aboutSchoolText4: This application was created as the final task of the React course of the RS School.
enterPasswordForLogin: Enter the password for log in
minPasswordLength8Chars: The minimum password length is 8 characters
atLeastOneLetterInPassword: At least one letter in the password
atLeastOneDigitInPassword: At least one digit in the password
atLeastOneSpecCharInPassword: At least one special character in the password
